mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reports and cases of law argued, and adjudged in the courts of law, at Westminister: In the time of the late Queen Elizabeth .. [1540-1615] / Collected by a learned professour of the law, William Leonard .. Published by Will. Hughes .. with alphabetical tables of the names of the cases, and of the matters contained in the book
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hughes, William, 1587 or 1588-1663?
Leonard, William.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by Tho. Roycroft, for Nath. Ekins
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Title varies: v. 2, The second part of Reports and cases of law ... ; v. 3, The third part of the Reports of several excellent cases of law ... ; v. 4, The fourth part of the Reports of several cases of law ..
"Translated by me out of the original French copy"--"To the reader", v. 1, signed: Will. Hughes.
Imprint varies: v. 3, London, Printed by John Streater; and are to be sold by Henry Twyford, Thomas Dring, John Place, and William Place.-- v. 4, London, Printed for William Lee and Abel Roper.
Includes a few cases of the reigns of Henry VIII, Edward VI, Mary and James I.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Great Britain.
